TopicTitle: [1.1.2] KSPRC - Renaissance Compilation: artworks remake [V-0.7 Pre Release 3]

Articles.Content: Using this mod with ATM and gets stuck at newoceanmoon00.

Using this mod with ATM and gets stuck at newoceanmoon00.

Seems impossible. I play right now in 32 bit, with 4GB RAM, without texture management. You should have more mods, for sure. So is not "this mod..." (or any other) is "I'm running out of memory".

Try to use more agressive ATM settings or force OpenGL mode.
So, will you add more atmosphere layers to Jool since it looks really ugly in stock?

Hey Proot ! Just passing by to say that your mod is fantastic looking, really impressed by your work, it's also running surprisingly well with my setup. Only thing is that I still prefer Ven's models and textures over yours, but other than that great stuff !

Okie dokie, so I PM'd Astronomer a short while ago and he said that you(/we) can use his Lightning and other features as long as you tweak them (and hopefully improve!). As far as I know, all you have to do is tweak a couple of textures and a config file from his pack. Proot, I highly recommend getting a clean install and installing the pack to see what these features look like and what they can do for immersion. It's near breathtaking to see how far KSP has come with the help of mods. Anyway, that's me done!

Edit: Hey Proot, would you ever consider setting up a dev thread? I think it is fair to say that some of us are keen to see what's happening and look at overall progress.

Edited December 10, 2014 by Chezburgar7300

Using this mod with ATM and gets stuck at newoceanmoon00.

If you are using the newest version of ATM you have to be very patient. Its going to take a very long time to load. It might seem frozen but its not. I am talking 1-3 hours of waiting. But in the end its worth it because the memory saving are amazing.

Seems impossible. I play right now in 32 bit, with 4GB RAM, without texture management. You should have more mods, for sure. So is not "this mod..." (or any other) is "I'm running out of memory".

Try to use more agressive ATM settings or force OpenGL mode.

If you are using the newest version of ATM you have to be very patient. Its going to take a very long time to load. It might seem frozen but its not. I am talking 1-3 hours of waiting. But in the end its worth it because the memory saving are amazing.

Fixed it, just some wrong files inside ATM config.

BTW, found some graphic glitches. I think I did everything right on installation. Is there anyway to fix these?

BTW excellent mod specially the skybox and Jool.

the line will be there till the newest EVE gets used which has better shader for that i think.
The lights thing is a stock KSP bug.

So for some reason the Turbo Jet, Large RCS tank, Winglet, DR Heatsheilds, and some other parts I can't remember have a lighted/Shadowed glitched texture. Another thing is that I can't get the Kerbol Textures to work.

AMAZING mod, kudos to you, sir!

P.S. Will it be updated for .90 soon after it comes out?
Soooo, i don't wanna be that guy but when is the update for 0.90 coming out?

Soooo, i don't wanna be that guy but when is the update for 0.90 coming out?

Proot will need to wait until all the dependent mods are updated (PlanetShine, EVE, TR, etc...) before he can fix up his settings, but have you tried using the old download/versions? Sometimes they are still compatible, sometimes not.

I'm back to the unemployment (now trying to get some money doing tattoos ), and I've worked with the EVE overhaul in my free time during a pair of weeks... so you can expect an update soon, but I'm afraid that all my modifications are completely dependent from his "framework" plugins. That is why I encourage the people so much to support to the mod developers and his favorite mods. Getting the game as we want it, without them, would be simply impossible.

Btw, I think that the next release is a huge step forward (but following the path of the last version), so please be patient and meanwhile try to update the plugins to 0.90.0 and use the actual version. (With the updated plugins all settings and textures should work for the moment, I think)
I must say that this mod is working on 0.90 ... only Distan Objets Enhancement does not work....
Hmmm after i put the toolbar now DOE works... the toolbar not so much but looks great

Hey Proot. Seven months ago we had this little exchange.

Proot. Would you consider making a larger wallpaper version of Sir Jeb?
I wish I could do it... but it's a photo-edition from a Squad's original image, I don't dare to redistribute it beyond the OP and his informative/humorous purpose.

But don't worry! New original art related to KSPRC is coming! ... and soonTM from LaikaSIR Common Enterprises.

Any news on that?

Hey Proot. Seven months ago we had this little exchange. Any news on that?

I have graphic material prepared and I'm making new things for the next release. The Laika Sir Common Enterprises is just postponed, but I like a lot that idea and I still want to do it as soon as I have time. (But for the moment is not much more that a concept, a flag and a logo, lol)
